Batman: Mask of the Phantasm

Rank: 330


Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually committed by a new vigilante assassin.


Director: Kevin Altieri

Writer: Alan Burnett, Paul Dini, Martin Pasko

Stars: Kevin Conroy, Dana Delany, Hart Bochner

Tags: Hand,Drawn Animation, Psychological Drama, Superhero, Suspense Mystery, Tragedy, Urban Adventure, Whodunnit, Action, Adventure, Animation
